properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Cape Blanco OR to Pt. St. George CA out 10 nm; Coastal waters from Florence to Cape Blanco OR out 10 nm; Waters from Cape Blanco OR to Pt. St. George CA from 10 to 60 nm
properties.headline: Special Marine Warning issued January 15 at 1:47PM PST until January 15 at 2:15PM PST by NWS Medford OR
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Medford has issued a

* Special Marine Warning for...
Coastal waters from Cape Blanco OR to Pt. St. George CA out 10
nm...
Coastal waters from Florence to Cape Blanco OR out 10 nm...
Waters from Cape Blanco OR to Pt. St. George CA from 10 to 60 nm...

* Until 215 PM PST.

* At 146 PM PST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing
waterspouts was located 14 nm southwest of Cape Blanco, moving
northeast at 45 knots.

HAZARD...Waterspouts, wind gusts in excess of 65 knots, and small
hail.

SOURCE...Radar.

IMPACT...Waterspouts can easily overturn boats and create locally
hazardous seas. Boats could suffer significant structural
damage in high winds. Small craft could capsize in
suddenly higher waves.

* Locations impacted include...
Cape Blanco.
properties.instruction:
Move to safe harbor until hazardous weather passes.

Thunderstorms can produce sudden waterspouts. Waterspouts can easily
overturn boats and create locally hazardous seas. Seek safe harbor
immediately.
